Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Transer

29213dee 00000fc9
29213d46 00000be8
2921575e 00000007
0121575f 00000002
00fb94ed 00000005
e0000000 80008000
These codes allow you to use more alt artwork by holding A+B on the card info screen.


NOTE: Since these codes are extremely useful, I've included them, they're credited for a reason i.e. I did not make them.
Have All Cards x9 [Bully@Wiiplaza]
C202C57C 00000002
39800009 99830339
88630339 00000000
*Credits to Skiller*

Have All Cards .. [Skiller]
005715F3 00000009
085715F4 00090009
28D40004 00000000
00573949 00000009
